text: @DrRPNishank @HRDMinistry Sir, Syllabus deduction is not an issue for meritorious students,but Physical attendence risking COVID-19 spread is an issue. My college from Bangalore is successfully conducting online classes,and I request you to instruct college for online continuance til corona is controlled.
